question: Question_02
statement:
Sketch the region in the first quadrant bounded by the curves

$y=x, \qquad y=4x, \qquad \text{and} \qquad xy=1$

and find the area of this region.
hints:
The area between the curves \emph{f(x)} and \emph{g(x)} is given by

\begin{align*}\int_a^b |f(x)-g(x)|\,dx.\end{align*}
